Text: Plenty of supplemental info for me.  These reissues are fantastic, hopefully you have others!  Yes was an amazing band (up until the early eighties anyway, lol)  It's nice to have replacements for my original purchases.  Thanks.

Thanks for the feedback...I hope the quality meets your approval as well (yes?).

As far as reissues go, I think you'll have to just check through my uploads and see what they say, I'm not sure from memory which albums are the original releases and which are reissued.

Enjoy!
J
Great work on this pre Yes Album Yes, much appreciated
